4315080.name: Indie Hoverboard Racing
4315080.description:
Indie Hoverboard Racing is a high-speed sci-fi racing game where entry to the top tier is earned, not given.

Set in a future where hoverboard racing is broadcast as a professional sport, you begin far from the spotlight. Before the city ever opens its gates, you’ll race through hostile regions, survive rival encounters, and defeat elite individuals who control access to official competitions.

Only the fastest advance. Only the strongest endure.

The Path to Nocturnia

Professional racers aren’t discovered. They’re forged.

Your journey follows a structured racing ladder inspired by real-world motorsport progression. Each stage is designed to test a different aspect of your skill — control, awareness, endurance, and precision — under increasing pressure.

  • Cherry Cup
    Your first proving ground. Fast, accessible tracks that test fundamentals, consistency, and composure.

  • Dark Forest Cup
    Low visibility, tight routes, and aggressive rivals who punish hesitation and poor judgement.

  • Outland Desert races
    Vast, exposed courses demanding raw speed, endurance, and perfect boost management.

Only racers who conquer every cup earn clearance for the professional circuit.

Survival Beyond the Track

Racing isn’t the only challenge.

Outside of cup events, you’ll take on high-risk quests across contested regions. Rival crews, hostile racers, and elite gatekeepers control key routes and refuse access to those who haven’t proven themselves. These encounters aren’t about position alone — they’re about survival.

Defeat the right individuals, complete dangerous objectives, and unlock access to the next stage of competition.

The Nocturnia City Circuit

This is the pinnacle.

The Nocturnia City Circuit is a neon-drenched, broadcast-first racing environment built for spectators and legends alike. Industrial underpasses, vertical drops, razor-thin margins, and relentless speed define every course.

Every race is watched.
Every mistake is remembered.

If you hesitate, you fall behind.
If you crash, the city moves on without you.

Key Features

  • High-speed hoverboard racing focused on momentum, control, and precision

  • Structured progression inspired by professional racing ladders

  • Multiple cups and regions leading to an elite city circuit

  • Rival racers, enemy encounters, and key individuals to defeat

  • Quest-based challenges that gate access to races and cups

  • Stylised sci-fi environments built for speed, risk, and spectacle

Release

Indie Hoverboard Racing is currently in development and targeting release in late 2026.

Wishlist the game, follow development, and prepare to earn your place on the circuit.
